name: Harpie Dancer
desc: You can target 1 WIND monster you control; return it to the hand, then you can Normal Summon 1 WIND monster. You can only use this effect of "Harpie Dancer" once per turn. This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while it is on the field or in the Graveyard.
str2: Do you want to Normal Summon 1 WIND monster from your hand?
